title: I  didn't get the 10 year Summoner Icon
body: I got the Riot Kayle skin but not the birthday poro icon . All of my friends got this special icon but i still didnt get it.

replies.body:
We're sending these out in waves, as *Zombiemaster* mentioned, so sit tight and we'll get you the icon! ^.^

Let me know if you don't have it by the *23rd.*

The gifts are being given out individually, so it's normal to receive one without yet receiving the others. The 23rd is the final day to receive the gifts, so if you haven't received them all by then, you can submit a support ticket.
My friends got their gifts too, I didn't get neither icon or mystery skin (got Riot Kayle already).. Help?
